title: JCrew Font
content:
Does anyone know these two typewriter (slab serif) and sans-serif fonts used on JCrew ads?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090924021949im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture2_5253.jpg)

Thanks!
author: shaggy1819

comments.content: The sans is Trade Gothic Bold Condensed.

The details of the typewriter font are hard to see clearly, but [Intellecta Typewriter](http://web.archive.org/web/20090924021949/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/intellecta/intellecta-typewriter/) looks similar to me. Iâ€™m sure a number of typewriter fonts would be close.

- Mike Yanega
